oppression.description: It's a sin to execute an unjust and cruel exercise of power or authority over others instead of respecting the God-given dignity of every human person.

envy.question: Have I felt envious of others' accomplishments, wishing they would experience setbacks or difficulties?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

envy.question: Have I resented others' successes, wishing they might lose them?
envy.description: Envy leads us to have discontent for another's possessions so we won't feel the pain of comparison or perceived lack in our own lives.

incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgar or hurtful language, violating their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in words that were hurtful or demeaning to others
incontinence.question: Did you lack self-control and express yourself in words that were hurtful or demeaning to others?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: with vulgarity that showed disrespect for their dignity
incontinence.question: Did I lack self-control and speak to others with vulgarity that showed disrespect for their dignity?
incontinence.description: This sin of incontinence shows a lack of self-restraint and violates the dignity of others.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
perhaps by consuming excessive amounts of food or drink during meals or social gatherings
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, perhaps by consuming excessive amounts of food or drink during meals or social gatherings?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to an excessive focus on my own desires and a neglect of God 's plan for me
gluttony.question: Did I overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, potentially leading to an excessive focus on my own desires and a neglect of God's plan for me?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

extracted_data_phrases: in eating or drinking beyond what 's reasonable
to indulging in culinary experiences during travel or trying new recipes at home
gluttony.question: Did you overindulge in eating or drinking beyond what's reasonable, especially when it comes to indulging in culinary experiences during travel or trying new recipes at home?
gluttony.description: This sin of gluttony demonstrates an inordinate attachment to worldly pleasures and rejects the call to temperance.

prodigality.question: Have I allowed excessive and wasteful gambling to take precedence over my financial responsibilities?
prodigality.description: This sin violates the virtue of stewardship by recklessly risking resources God has entrusted to us, while potentially harming our ability to provide for family and those in need.

extracted_data_phrases: in sharing private affairs about acquaintances through casual conversations
gossip.question: Have I taken pleasure in sharing private affairs about acquaintances through casual conversations?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: for my own amusement or to impress those around me
gossip.question: Have I shared in discussing others' private affairs, even if what I said was true, for my own amusement or to impress those around me?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

extracted_data_phrases: by sharing or reveling in others ' private affairs
gossip.question: Have I entertained myself by sharing or reveling in others' private affairs, even if what I shared was true?
gossip.description: Gossip violates human dignity and charity by harming others' reputations for our own entertainment or pride.

anger.question: Have I nursed anger rather than seeking reconciliation with those I hold dear?
anger.description: Uncontrolled anger corrupts our own heart, damages our relationship with both God and neighbor.
